column4: Hi, I just received my 500gb external usb hard drive and I do not know how to get it to work.  ubuntu recognizes it but i cannot move files to it to store, does the hard drive need to be formated, would anyone be willing to give me some help...thank you
do you have any idea what file system the drive's formatted as right now? NTFS?
what do you want to do with the drive? strictly Linux? share data between Linux and Win?
open a term, type gparted ... bring up the partition editor, and it will tell you what the file system is
